section.title: Introduction to Stellarium
section.para: Stellarium is a Open Source Software which can simulate the view of astronomical objects present in the sky. In short it brings the sky virtually to your computer. It also shows the objects that can be seen during a particular time. The other planets and their natural satellites of other planets can also be seen. It can also be used as a tool for learning astronomy.
